autoEnable.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub for new accounts in the organization.

autoEnableStandards.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub default standards for new member accounts in the organization. By default, this parameter is equal to `DEFAULT`, and new member accounts are automatically enabled with default Security Hub standards. To opt out of enabling default standards for new member accounts, set this parameter equal to `NONE`.
